PublicService.name: Enrollment of a Student in Primary School

evs.name: Student Birth Certificate
evs.description: Automatically issued by the Municipal Registry Information System. If not automated, a copy must be submitted by the parent or guardian.

evs.name: Child Health Booklet (vaccination page)
evs.description: Required to confirm that the prescribed vaccinations have been carried out according to the National Vaccination Program.

evs.name: Proof of Permanent Residence
evs.description: Can be a utility bill, lease agreement, or certification of permanent residence from the Municipality.

evs.name: Kindergarten Attendance Certificate
evs.description: Required for all children enrolling in the first grade of primary school for the first time.

evs.name: Enrollment Application
evs.description: The application is submitted by the parent or guardian at the local school, usually during the period 10–20 June.

criterion_requirements.name: The child must have completed the 6th year of age by 31 December of the current year.
The child must be a permanent resident of the school’s catchment area.
Enrollment must occur within the prescribed period (10–20 June).
The parent or guardian must submit a complete file of supporting documents.
